data.content: I am a senior from CIT who has been DJing since my Freshman Year. Involved with both the American and Indian scene, I've opened for Lupe Fiasco, DJed at 2 Carnival Parties with Steve and have worked with Pranesh to make mixtapes and DJ Live. I made the BIB Mixtape for 2 consecutive years.

templates.html:
<form id="<%= searchID %>">
<input type="text" name="q">
<input type="submit" value="<%= buttonText %>">
</form>
templates.js: function renderInList (e, d) { if (e) alert(e); else { for (var i = 0; i < d.photos.photo.length; i ++) { var photo = d.photos.photo[i]; $('#<%= galleryID %>').append(''); } }}$('#<%= searchID %>').submit(function() { var formData = $('#<%= searchID %>').serializeArray(); models.Picture.randomNFromFlickr(formData[0].value, 10, renderInList); return false;});
